creator: bogdan_vazzyb@yahoo.com
text:
Have two Thread Groups in which a User Defined Variables field is added.
Define var1=123 in the first Thread Group and var1=1234 in the second Thread Group. When enabling both Thread Groups and running them, the value in both Thread Groups is the last one 1234.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
This is working as designed and as documented, see:

http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/usermanual/component_reference.html#User_Defined_Variables

where it says:

Note that all the UDV elements in a test plan - no matter where they are - are processed at the start.
